headline: BBSI Appoints Joseph S. Clabby as Chairman of the Board
summary: Anthony Meeker to Continue as Director VANCOUVER, Wash., June 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Barrett Business Services, Inc. (BBSI) (NASDAQ: BBSI), a leading provider of business management solutions and one of the largest professional employer organizations (PEO) in the U.S., today announced that Joseph S. Clabby has been appointed Chairman of the Board of Directors. He succeeds Tony Meeker, who will continue to serve as a member of the board. "On behalf of the board and leadership team, I want t

headline: Chubb (NYSE:CB) Partners With EWC To Provide Worldwide Coverage For Luxury Watch Collections
summary: European Watch Company's recent partnership with Chubb (NYSE:CB) to provide insurance coverage for luxury watch collections highlights a strategic expansion in Chubb's offerings. Over the past quarter, Chubb's share price moved 3%, aligning with broader market trends, which saw a 13% rise over the past year and a flat trajectory in the last seven days. Enhancements, such as a 6% dividend increase and a significant share buyback program, likely added weight to Chubb's price movements. These...

headline: European Watch Company Partners with Chubb to Offer Insurance Protection for Luxury Timepieces and Jewelry
summary: BOSTON, June 04, 2025--European Watch Company (EWC), the premier destination for luxury pre-owned timepieces, is proud to announce its exclusive partnership with Chubb, a world leader in insurance. The new collaboration, with one of the most trusted brands in the insurance industry, will make worldwide coverage available for EWC clients’ valuable watch collections.

content.title: European Watch Company Partners with Chubb to Offer Insurance Protection for Luxury Timepieces and Jewelry
content.summary: BOSTON, June 04, 2025--European Watch Company (EWC), the premier destination for luxury pre-owned timepieces, is proud to announce its exclusive partnership with Chubb, a world leader in insurance. The new collaboration, with one of the most trusted brands in the insurance industry, will make worldwide coverage available for EWC clients’ valuable watch collections.
